trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur has his heart set on carts.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Garharlor.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Garharlor.

TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Vuyargur)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Since our work commenced, we have been needing to transport large amounts of supplies to Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>While we have simple, sturdy carts for this purpose, there is presently not enough to meet demand. I wish to build more, and ask that you furnish us with some necessary parts.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might I trouble you to furnish us with cart components again?
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>The conveyances assembled using your parts are highly favored for their maneuverability, and I have a mind to build more.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>Garharlor yonder has the materials you require, so please present yourself to him. My thanks in advance.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_006<tab>You are helping us build carts? Good, good, quality components are always welcome.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_007<tab>Without further ado, then, please use these materials to prepare parts for the underframe. If you run out, I shall provide you with more.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_008<tab>Without further ado, then, please use these materials to prepare parts for the dampener. If you run out, I shall provide you with more.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_009<tab>Without further ado, then, please use these materials to prepare parts for the axle. If you run out, I shall provide you with more.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_010<tab>When the items are ready, you may deliver them directly to Vuyargur. I wish you happy crafting.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_011<tab>Do you require more materials? You need but say the word if so.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_012<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_013<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_014<tab>You require more materials? Here, please use these.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_015<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_GARHARLOR_000_016<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_018<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. How are the cart components coming along?

TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_019<tab>Sturdy <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> light... At scarcely more than a glance, you were able to identify a point for improvement. You truly are an extraordinary artisan.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>You spare no effort, and it shows in the finish. I receive these with thanks.
TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>We Yok Huy traditionally build with stone and wood, and typically prioritize strength at the cost of weight.

TEXT_BANYOK102_05337_VUYARGUR_000_022<tab>Given the mountainous terrain in which the carts will be used, however, it would be wise to keep weight to a limit. Your components help us to achieve that, and I shall enjoy assembling the final product with them.
